articles.title: AbRam's birthday: Check Suhana Khan's heart-warming post - Mint
articles.description: On May 27, 2024, AbRam - Shah Rukh Khan and Gauri’s third child - turned 11. It coincided with KKR’s historic victory in IPL 2024.
